00054 void VLNVDialer::onHideShowClick() {
00055         // if filters were hidden
00056         if (hidden_) {
00057                 filters_.show();
00058                 hideButton_.setIcon(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/triangle_arrow_up.png"));
00059         }
00060         // if filters were visible
00061         else {
00062                 filters_.hide();
00063                 hideButton_.setIcon(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/triangle_arrow_down.png"));
00064         }
00065 
00066         // change the hidden value
00067         hidden_ = !hidden_;
00068 }
